original_text: Then they threw away all the idols of foreign gods that they had been worshipping. They began to worship the Lord again. Finally, the Lord decided to help them, because he saw how upset they were.
korean_text: 자기 가운데에서 이방 신들을 제하여 버리고 여호와를 섬기매 여호와께서 이스라엘의 곤고로 말미암아 마음에 근심하시니라

sentences.original_text: Then they threw away all the idols of foreign gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 모든 이방 신들의 우상을 버렸습니다

sentences.original_text: They began to worship the Lord again
Finally, the Lord decided to help them
because he saw how upset they were
